channel.title: OpenFoundry - Recently Added Listings - 網路監控軟體

item.title: raven-monitoring
item.description: Raven-monitoring, Program for service and equipment monitoring, is a web-based monitoring tool. It supports network scanning daemon web inferface. The application is a free, open source monitoring system that provides the adaptability of a modern monitoring system without being complex or hard to configure. License under Apache License 2.0.
item.author: ymhuang0808
